message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $12,000 by you. I understand its significant worth to you and would like to extend an exclusive opportunity. For this unique offering, I propose to sell it to you at a special price of $10,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its full value and provides you with exceptional benefits. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations or if there's any way I can assist further.
